name: Urbe Roma
description:
Made for the Historically Acurate Game Jam Theme: Mythology

Your task is simple: Found Rome! But be careful and don't build yourself into a corner!

Controls

LookRight Mouse Button + Move Mouse
MoveW A S D / Arrow Keys
Select / Place
Left Mouse Button
Screenshot mode
0CheatF1

Horribly unbalanced and glitchy, but hey here is my own take on the Islanders Formula made in 3 days!
